subject: Purchase question pedal set
description_text:
Hi Dears,

I am thinking of buying below set from the snapshot. I was wondering why mounting brackets are available for brake and throttle pedals, but not for clutch- it is not needed for the clutch?

Also I tried to place the order but in shipping page I have not found Poland on the list… can you tell me how am I supposed to place the order and what is the shipping time?

Looking forward for your answer.
Kind regards
Michal

Sent from [Proton Mail](https://proton.me/mail/home) for iOS.

conversations.body_text: Hi Michał Brewka,  Customers in Poland can place orders directly through our Polish distributor, and the products will be shipped locally from Poland  https:/fmic.pl/elektronika/simracing?product_brand=Simsonn
